summary: Småland, Sweden, mid-19th century. A farming family struggle with their rocky, unyielding land, and decide to embark on the arduous journey to new hope in America.
cast: Max von Sydow|Liv Ullmann|Eddie Axberg|Sven-Olof Bern|Aina Alfredsson|Allan Edwall|Monica Zetterlund|Pierre Lindstedt|Hans Alfredson|Ulla Smidje|Eva-Lena Zetterlund|Gustaf Färingborg|Åke Fridell|Agneta Prytz|Halvar Björk|Arnold Alfredsson|Bror Englund|Tom C. Fouts|Peter Høimark|Erik Johansson|Staffan Liljander|Göran Lundin|Ditte Martinsson|Lasse Martinsson|Pelle Martinsson|Annika Nyhammar|Yvonne Oppstedt|Bruno Sörwing|Linn Ullmann
title: Los emigrantes
